src_text: three new laws are already working to strengthen the criminal justice system and support survivors.
tgt_text: "kusetjentiswa kwalomtsetfo kutawusita kakhulu kucinisekisa kutsi emacala ashushiswa ngemphumelelo, kutsi labo labasindzile bavikeleke nekutsi kunetintfo letingetiwe letisebenta kancono letibekiwe tekubavikela."

src_text: "the implementation of this legislation will go a long way to ensuring that cases are successfully prosecuted, that survivors are protected and that there are more effective deterrents in place."
tgt_text: lomunye walemitsetfo mengameli bekakhuluma ngawo ngumtsetfo wekuchibiyela tindzaba tetebugebengu naloku phatselene naloko lovikela labo labasengotini kutsi bangahlukumeteki kwesibili.

src_text: one of the new laws that president ramaphosa was referring to is the criminal and related matters amendment act which protects the vulnerable from secondary victimisation.
tgt_text: lomtsetfo lona uvumela tinkhantolo kutsi tikhetse bangeneleli labangenta luhlolo emntfwaneni lomncane, emuntfwini lonekukhubateka noma emuntfwini losekagugile ngesikhatsi licala lisachubeka.

src_text: this act allows the courts to appoint intermediaries through which a minor, a disabled person or an elderly person can be examined in proceedings.
tgt_text: mengameli bekakhuluma futsi ngalomtsetfo wekuchibiyela umtsetfo wetebugebengu (emacala etemacansi nalokuphatselene naloko) lomusha lowenta kube licala kucashatwa ngekwelicansi nekufundzisa temacansi bantfu labagula ngekwengcondvo.

src_text: the president was also referring to the new criminal law (sexual offences and related matters) amendment act which outlaws sexual exploitation and grooming of persons with mental disabilities.
tgt_text: lomtsetfo uphindze ubeke kutsi emacala etemacansi lentiwa ebantfwini labagula ngekwengcondvo kufuneka abhalwe kurejista yave lonkhe yetaphula mtsetfo tetemacansi.

src_text: this act also states that sexual offences against persons who are mentally disabled must be recorded in the national register of sex offenders.
tgt_text: umtsetfo wekuchibiyela teludlame lwasekhaya ulandzisa ngaletinye tintfo letiyinkhinga kubudlelwane basekhaya lobuneludlame.

src_text: the domestic violence amendment act takes account of some of the complexities in violent domestic relationships.
tgt_text: lomtsetfo uvumela kutsi kube netinchubo tekutfola imiyalo yasenkhantolo yekuvikela, futsi wandzisa letimo lekungafakwa ngato sicelo semyalo wasenkhantolo wekuvikela.

src_text: the act allows for the process of obtaining protection orders, and broadened the circumstances under which a protection order can be applied for.

src_text: end of state of disaster in sight for sa vukuzenzele unnamed president cyril ramaphosa recently announced in his 2022 state of the nation address (sona) that government plans to scrap the national state of disaster as the coun try enters a new phase in the management of the coronavirus disease (covid19) pandemic.
tgt_text: sesisondzele sikhatsi sekuphela kwesimo senhlekele esa vukuzenzele unnamed mengameli cyril ramaphosa usandza kumemetela enkhulumeni yebunjalo besive (isona) yakhe yemnyaka we2022 kutsi hulumende uhlele kususa lesimo savelonkhe senhlekelele njengoba lelive lingena kusigaba lesisha sekulawula lobhubhane wesifo seligciwa ne lekhorona (ico vid19).

src_text: "it is our intention to end the national state of disaster as soon as we have finalised other measures under the national health act and other legislation to contain the pandemic," said the president.
tgt_text: "kuyinhloso yetfu kucedza simo senhlekelele yavelonkhe masinyane uma sesivumelene ngaletinye tindlela letingaphasi kwemtsetfo wavelonkhe wetemphilo kanye naleminye imitsetfo yekulawula lobhubhane," kusho mengameli.

src_text: on 15 march 2020, president ramaphosa declared the national state of disaster in terms of the disaster management act and announced a range of measures to contain the covid19 outbreak.
tgt_text: mhla ti15 indlovulenkhulu 2020, mengameli ramaphosa wamemetela lesimo senhlekelele yavelonkhe ngekulandzela umtsetfo wekulawula inhlekelele futsi wamemetela tindlela letehlukahlukene tekuvikela kucubuka kwecovid19.

src_text: president ramaphosa said nearly all restrictions on economic and social activity have already been lifted, which is largely thanks to the vaccination rollout programme.
tgt_text: mengameli ramaphosa utse cishe yonkhe imibandzela lemayelana netemnotfo netenhlalo sevele isusiwe, ikakhulu ngenca yalokwetfulwa kwaloluhlelo lwekuphakelwa kwemitsi yekugoma.

src_text: he reminded citizens that vaccines are the best defence against illness, death and covid19, which has claimed close to 100 000 lives locally.
tgt_text: ukhumbute bantfu kutsi imitsi yekugoma iyincenye lencono yekuvikela kugula, kufa necovid19, lesevele itsetse imiphefumulo yebantfu lecishe ibe100 000 eveni letfu.

src_text: "i've always said from a personal point of view, had i have not been vaccinated, in december when i contracted covid19, i probably will not be standing here," he reflected.
tgt_text: "bengisolo ngisho ngekubona kwami kutsi, uma ngabe bengingakagomi, ngengongoni ngesikhatsi ngibanjwa yicovid19, ngiyatsemba kutsi ngabe akusimi lome lapha," wabeka njalo.

src_text: the president took the time to urge south africans to take the lifesaving jab and continue to observe basic health measures and remain vigilant.
tgt_text: mengameli utsatse lesikhatsi kuncusa bantfu baseningizimu afrika kutsi batfole lomtsamo losindzisa imphilo futsi bachubeke nekulandzela tindlela tetemphilo letisisekelo nekutsi bahlale bacaphele njalo.

src_text: "we will be able to get on with our lives, even with the virus in our midst," he said, adding that the pandemic has exacerbated the divide between those who are employed and those who are jobless.
tgt_text: "sitawukhona kuchubeka ngetimphilo tetfu, nanoma ngabe leligciwane lisemkhatsini kwetfu," usho njalo, wangeta ngekutsi leligciwane likhulise ligeba lelisemkhatsini kwalabo labasebentako nalabo labangasebenti.

src_text: solidarity fund president ramaphosa announced that the solidarity fund has raised r3.4 billion from more than 300 000 south africans and companies, while more than 400 individuals and 100 companies volunteered their time and services.
tgt_text: sikhwama sekubumbana mengameli ramaphosa wamemetela kutsi lesikhwama sekubumbana sitfole emabhiliyoni lar3.4 lavela ebantfwini baseningizimu afrika nakutinkhapani, ngaleso sikhatsi bantfu labangetulu kwe400 netinkhapani leti100 bavolontiya ngesikhatsi sabo nangetinsita tabo.

src_text: "the fund has played a pivotal role in supporting the national health response and alleviating the humanitarian crisis that confronted our country and our people.
tgt_text: "lesikhwama sadlala indzima lenkhulu kusekela kumphendvulo yetemphilo tavelonkhe nasekucedzeni lenhlekelele lebukene nelive letfu kanye nebantfu bakitsi."

src_text: "he thanked everyone who contributed to the fund, including some members of parliament, and other initiatives to support those affected by the pandemic.
tgt_text: ubonge wonkhe umuntfu lonikelile kulesikhwama, lokufaka ekhatsi emalunga ephalamende kanye naletinye tindlela tekusekela labo labatsintsekile ngalobhubhane.

src_text: the president also paid tribute to the many healthcare and frontline workers who play a key role in the fight against covid19.
tgt_text: mengameli uphindze watfula sigcoko kuletisebenti tetemphilo letinengi naletinye tisebenti letenta umsebenti lobucayi etikhungweni tetemphilo letidlale indzima lenkhulu ekulweni necovid19.

src_text: "the nation owes a great debt of gratitude to the dedicated health workers and to other frontline staff who put their own health and lives at risk to care for the ill and the vulnerable during this period," he said.
tgt_text: "sive kufuneka sibonge kakhulu kuletisebenti tetemphilo ngekutibophelela kwato nakuleto letenta umsebenti lobucayi ngekutidzela ngemphilo yato nangekubeka imphilo yato engotini kute tinakekele labagulako nalabo lababutsakatsaka ngalekhatsi," usho njalo.

src_text: special tribunal is showing that crime does not pay vukuzenzele unnamed during the recent presidential imbizo in mahikeng, several citizens raised concerns about the pace of the fight against corruption.
tgt_text: inkhundla yetebulungiswa lekhetsekile ikhombisa kutsi bugebengu abunambuyiselo allison cooper kulembizo yeli hhovisi lamengameli lesandza kwenteka emahikeng, takhamuti letinyenti tikhombise kukhatsateka mayelana nelitubane lekulwa nenkhohlakalo.

src_text: they told me what i have heard in many other communities across the country: that the perpetrators of such acts are known, not least because they flaunt the proceeds of their crimes.
tgt_text: bangitjele tintfo lengiti vile nakuleminye imimango kulo lonkhe lelive: kutsi lababhebhetseli baletento letinjena bayatiwa, ngoba babukisa ngenzuzo yebugebengu babo.

src_text: but the arm of the law is long.
tgt_text: kodvwa sandla semtsetfo sidze.

src_text: those who have stolen from the state may believe they have gotten away with it.
tgt_text: labo labantjontjele umbuso bangakholelwa ekutseni baphunyulile.

src_text: but their deeds will eventually catch up with them, whoever they are, and whatever position they may hold.
tgt_text: kodvwake ekugcineni tento tabo titawubabamba, noma ngabe bangubobani, nanoma ngusiphi sikhundla labakuso.

src_text: they will learn that crime does not pay.
tgt_text: batawufundza kutsi bugebengu abunambuyiselo.

src_text: in this regard, one of our most effective weapons in the fight against corruption and state capture is the special tribunal of the special investigating unit (siu), which i established in 2019. it adjudicates on matters that the siu institutes for civil litigation after it has concluded its investigations.
tgt_text: mayelana naloku, sinye setikhali tetfu lesinemandla kakhulu kutsi silwe nenkhohlakalo nekubanjwa kwembuso ngabhongwane inkhundla yetebulungiswa lekhetsekile yeluphiko lwetekuphenya lolu khetsekile (isiu), lenga yisungula nga2019.

src_text: the special tribunal was set up to speed up litigation.
tgt_text: yehlulela ngetindzaba letisungulwe yisiu kute kutekwe emacala embango ngemuva kwekuphotfula luphenyo lwayo.

src_text: this approach has made it possible for public funds and state assets lost to corrupt acts to be recovered faster, avoiding delays in the high courts, where the siu has to wait its turn together with other litigants.
tgt_text: inkhundla yetebulungiswa lekhe tsekile yasungulelwa kutsi kusheshiswe kutekwa kwemacala.

src_text: the siu can request preservation orders and the freezing of assets to prevent further losses to the state.
tgt_text: lendlela seye nte kwakhona kutsi timali kanye nemphahla yembuso lebeyilahlekile ngekwetizatfu tetento tenkhohlakalo kutsi titfolwe masinyane, kugwenywe kubambeleleka etinkantolo letiphakeme, lapho isiu ifanele kutsi ilindzele litfuba layo ikanye nalabanye bamangali.

src_text: this is important when considering that per petrators who are under suspicion often go to great lengths to move around, hide or dispose of proceeds of corruption.
tgt_text: isiu ingacela imiyalelo yekulondvolota kanye nekubanjwa kwemphahla kute kutsi kuvinjelwe lokunye kulahlekelwa umbuso longahlangabeta nako.

src_text: there can be no doubt the special tribunal has been a game changer.
tgt_text: loku kubalulekile uma kucutjungulwa kutsi benti balokubi labasuke basoleka bavamise kuhambahamba, babhace noma balahle imali labayitfole ngenkhohlakalo.

src_text: since its establishment, the tribunal has recovered around r8.6 billion from unlawful contracts.
tgt_text: akungabateki kutsi inkhundla yetebulungiswa lekhetsekile itishintjile tintfo.

src_text: for any fight against corruption to be deemed effective, it is not sufficient that perpetrators are pro secuted.
tgt_text: kusukelwa yasungu lwa, lenkhundla sivumbulule tigidzigidzi leticishe tibe ngur8.6 kumakontileka langekho emtsetfweni.

src_text: the proceeds of their crimes must be recovered.
tgt_text: nanoma ngukuphi kulwa nenkhohlakalo lokutsiwa kube yimphumelelo, akweneli kutsi babhebhetseli bashushiwe.

src_text: this money belongs to citizens and should be used to meet their needs.
tgt_text: loko labakuzuze kubugebengu babo kufanele kutfolwe kutsatfwe.

src_text: the special tribunal recently ordered two construction companies to return the profits they earned from r40 million in contracts to erect the beit bridge border fence.
tgt_text: lemali lena yetakhamuti futsi ifanele kutsi isetjentiselwe kuhlangabetana netidzingo tabo.

src_text: this followed an investigation by the siu that uncovered a number of irregularities, including a prepayment to the companies by the department of public works and infrastructure.
tgt_text: lenkhundla yetebulungi swa lekhetsekile isandza kuyalela tinkampane tekwakha letimbili kutsi tibuyise intalo letitfole kumakontileka etigidzi letinger40 ekufaka fenisi emnyeleni ebeit bridge.

src_text: over the past few weeks alone, the tribunal has reviewed and set aside more than r100 million worth of irregular and unlawful contracts arising from covidrelated pro curement.
tgt_text: loku kulandzela luphenyo lolwentiwa yisiu leyatfola lokunyenti lokungahambi kahle, lokufaka ekhatsi inkhokhelophambilini yaletinkampani leyentiwa litiko letemisebenti yahulumende nesakhiwo nchanti.

src_text: the special tribunal has also been successful in getting back money from senior executives in stateowned enterprises who conducted irregular business activities.
tgt_text: kulamaviki lambalwa lengcilenje kuphela, lenkhundla yetebulu ngiswa ibuyekete yaphindze yabeka eceleni emakontileka emali lengetulu kwetigidzi letingetulu kwer100 langahambi kahle nalangekho emtsetfweni lavele ekutsengweni kwetintfo letiphatselene necovid19.

src_text: for example, last year a former transnet executive was ordered to pay r26 million he received as a shareholder of a firm of consulting engineers contracted to transnet while he was a fulltime employee.
tgt_text: lenkhundla yetebu lungiswa lekhetsekile iphindze futsi yaphumelela ekutfoleni imali kulabakhulu besigungu lesiphetse kutinkampani tembuso labachuba tebhizinisi letingahambi kahle.

src_text: the siu has in a number of cases approached the tribunal to delay the payment of pension benefits, pending the outcome of its investigations, to public servants implicated in financial irregularities or fruitless and wasteful expenditure.
tgt_text: sibonelonje, kulomnya ka lowendlulile loyo bekasikhulu sakatransnet wayalelwa kutsi akhokhe tigidzi letinger26 lati tfola njengemninimasheya enkampanini yebunjingalwati betebunjiniyela labanikwa ikontileka yetransnet abe asasebenta njengesisebenti lesicashwe ngalokuphelele.

src_text: the cases before the special tribunal show that much work still needs to be done to strengthen governance and management across all arms of the state.
tgt_text: isiu emacaleni lama nyentana icele inkhundla yetebulungiswa kutsi ibambelele kukhokhwa kwetinzuzo tetemphesheni, lapho kusalindvwe umphumela weluphenyo lwayo, kubasebenti bahulumende labatsintseka ekutiphatseni ngalokungakalungi kwetimali noma kusetjentiswa kwemali lokungenasidzi ngo nalokusaphata imali.

src_text: they point to serious lapses on the part of accounting officers and failures to adhere to laws and regulations governing procurement i have said before that winning the war on cor ruption will be difficult, and that it will take time to unravel the vast webs of patronage that had become entrenched.
tgt_text: emacala lasembi kwe nkhundla yetebulungiswa lekhetsekile akhombisa kutsi usesemkhulu umsebenti lokusamele wentiwe kucinisa kwengamela imisebenti yahulumende nekuphatsa kuto tonkhe tinhlaka tembuso.

src_text: i have also maintained that we must fight private sector corruption with equal vigour, because for every public sector employee willing to be bribed, there is a business person willing to pay a bribe.
tgt_text: akhomba kungaphumeleli lokukhulu kwetikhulu letiphendvulako kanye nekwehluleka kuhambisana nemitsetfo nemitsetfomgomo lelawula kutsengwa kwemphahla.

src_text: these corrupt relationships have eroded the capacity of the state to deliver on its mandate.
tgt_text: ngike ngasho phambilini kutsi kuncoba imphi yenkhohlakalo kutawuba matima, futsi kutawutsatsa sikhatsi kudzalula lentfu mbeleta leseyijulile.

src_text: they have set back the state’s efforts to provide decent healthcare, to deliver clean water, and to ensure a consistent supply of power to communities and businesses.
tgt_text: ngikugcizelele nekutsi kumele silwe nenkhohlakalo etinkampanini letitimele ngemandla lalinganako, ngoba kuwo wonkhe umsebenti wemkhakha wahulumende lotimisele ngekufumbatsiswa, kunasomabhizinisi lotimisele ngekufumbatsisa.

src_text: but, as the special tribunal has demonstrated, we are steadily turning the tide.
tgt_text: lobudlelwane lobu khohlakele sebumoshe bukhoni bembuso kutsi isebente ngekuya kweligunyakwenta layo.

src_text: not only are perpetrators being arrested and taken to court; they are also having to forfeit the proceeds of their crimes.
tgt_text: bubuyisele emuva imitamo yembuso yekunika sive tinsita tekunakekelwa ngetekwelashwa letisezingeni lelifanele, kuphakelwa emanti lahlantekile, kanye nekucinisekisa kutfolakala kwagezi lokungenamnca muko emimangweni nakumabhizinisi.

src_text: there is still a long way to go, and there is a huge amount of stolen public funds that still need to be recovered.
tgt_text: kodvwake, njengobe lenkhundla yetebulungi swa lekhetsekile seyi khombisile, siyatigucula tintfo kancanekancane.

src_text: but the siu and the special tribunal have made a good start, and i am confident of many more successes in the months and years ahead.
tgt_text: inkhundla yetebulungiswa lekhetsekile ikhombisa kutsi bugebengu abunambuyiselo allison cooper kulembizo yeli hhovisi lamengameli lesandza kwenteka emahikeng, takhamuti letinyenti tikhombise kukhatsateka mayelana nelitubane lekulwa nenkhohlakalo.

src_text: food at school ensures children don’t go hungry vukuzenzele unnamed over nine million children receive a nutritious meal at school thanks to government’s national school nutrition programme (nsnp), which was introduced in 1994. the programme aims to improve children’s ability to learn, by reducing malnutrition and hunger and improving school attendance, especially at disadvantaged schools.
tgt_text: luhlelo lwekudla esikolweni lucinisekisa kutsi bantfwana abalambi vukuzenzele unnamed bantfwana labangetulu kwetigidzi letiyimfica batfola kudla lokunemsoco esikolweni ngenca yeluhlelo lwahulumende lekudla etikolweni tavelonkhe (insnp), lolwacala kusebenta ngemnyaka we1994.

src_text: "the programme is critical for furthering learners’ constitutional rights to basic nutrition and basic education," explains deputy minister of basic education dr reginah mhaule.
tgt_text: loluhlelo luhlose kutfutfukisa likhono lebantfwana lekufundza, ngekunciphisa indlala nekungondleki kahle naseku khuliseni kuta esikoleni, kakhulu etikolweni lebetincishwe ema tfuba.

src_text: as a result of the nsnp, more children are attending school on time and more regularly, and their concentration in class has improved.
tgt_text: "loluhlelo lumcoka ekuchubekiseni emalungelo ebafundzi lakumtsetfosisekelo ekutfola kudla lokusisekelo newekutfola imfundvo lesisekelo," kuchaza lisekela lendvuna yemfundvo lesisekelo dkt reginah mhaule.

src_text: according to the department of basic education (dbe), learners are taught good eating and lifestyle habits.
tgt_text: ngenca yalensnp, banyenti bantfwana labaya ngesikhatsi esikolweni futsi labaya njalo esikolweni, futsi kugcila kwengcondvo etifundvweni kuyatfutfuka.

src_text: schools are also encouraged to set up their own food gardens to supplement the nsnp menu.
tgt_text: ngekuya kwelitiko lete mfundvo lesisekelo (idbe) bafundzi bafundziswa kudla kahle kanye nangendlela yeku phila lekahle.

src_text: learners, teachers and parents are taught grow their own food.
tgt_text: tikolwa futsi tiyagcugcutelwa kutsi titisungulele tingadze tato tekudla kute tingete kulokudla kwensnp.

src_text: nsnp awards thabang primary school in bethlehem, free state, is one of the schools that benefits from the nsnp.
tgt_text: bafundzi, bothi shela nebatali bayafundziswa kutsi batilimele kudla kwabo.

src_text: the school recently won the nsnp best school award.
tgt_text: imiklomela yensnp sikolwa semabanga laphasi ithabang primary school sasebethlehem, singulesinye setikolwa lesizuzako kunsnp.

src_text: the awards celebrate schools’ nutrition programmes by looking at their hygiene and safety practices, nutritious meals, food gardens and nutrition education.
tgt_text: lesikolwa sisandza kuwina umklomela wensnp wesi kolwa lesihamba embili.

src_text: "i am extremely grateful that the school won the award," says seyanokeng sejake, the thabang pri mary principal for the past 24 years.
tgt_text: lemiklomela ibungata luhlelo lwekudla lwetikolo ngekubuka kuhlanteka netekuphepha, kudla lokunemsoco, tingadze tekudla netemfundvo yetekudla.

src_text: thabang primary school has been running its nutrition programme since 1994. today, it ensures that its 1 065 learners receive a healthy breakfast daily from a local business.
tgt_text: "ngibonga kakhulu kutsi lesikolwa siwine lomklomelo," kusho seyanokeng sejake, longuthishelanhloko wethabang primary school kuleminyaka lema24 leyengcile.

src_text: the food is cooked by unemployed members of the community, who are appointed by the school governing body (sgb).
tgt_text: sikolo ithabang primary school besisebentisa loluhlelo lwetekudla kusukela nge mnyaka we1994.

src_text: "our six employed voluntary food handlers (vfh) make the food provided by the department of basic education through the allocation of funds to the school," says sejake.
tgt_text: namuhla, sicinisekisa kutsi bafundzi baso laba1 065 batfola sidlo sasekuseni lesinemphilo onkhe malanga kubosomabhizinisi balendzawo.

src_text: they vfhs each receive a stipend for preparing the food.
tgt_text: lokudla kuphekwa malunga emmango langasebenti, lacashwe ngumtimba lolawula sikolwa (isgb).

src_text: thabang primary school took top honours at the awards due to the hard work and commitment of its sgb, management team and functional nsnp com mittee, says sejake.
tgt_text: "bantfu labasitfupha labatinikele kusebenta ngalokudla (emavfh) benta lokudla lokuvela kulitiko letemfundvo ngekusebentisa lwabiwomali lwalesikolwa," kusho sejake.

src_text: "punctuality is the order of the day.
tgt_text: ngilelo nalelovhf litfola inkhokhelo ngekupheka lokudla.

src_text: we don’t allow absenteeism, without a valid reason, and we have no dropouts.
tgt_text: sikolo ithabang primary school sahamba embili kulomci mbi wekuklonyeliswa ngenca yekusebenta ngekutikhandla nekutibophelela kwesgb, kwelicembu leliphetse kanye nekuba nekomiti yensnp lesebentako, kusho sejake.

src_text: our learners’ concentration and general performance have also improved," she adds.
tgt_text: "kugcina sikhatsi yintfo lelandzelwa njalo.

src_text: as the prize for winning the award is a stateoftheart kitchen built by the tiger brands foundation, the school’s nutrition programme is set to become even better.

src_text: "for example, we have a food garden that supplies vegetables to supplement the nsnp allocation," explains sejake.

src_text: keep children safe online vukuzenzele unnamed with the world increasingly moving online, it’s important for children to take advantage these opportunities while also staying safe.
tgt_text: gcina bantfwana baphephile kuinthanethi vukuzenzele unnamed njengoba umhlaba ukhulisa lizinga lekusebentisa iinthanethi, kumcoka kutsi bantfwana batsatse lelitfuba babe futsi bahlala baphephile.

src_text: the government communication and information system (gcis) and digify africa recently hosted a webinar with media monitoring africa (mma) and the film and publication board (fpb) to teach children, educators, parents and the public about how to be responsible online.
tgt_text: tekuchumana tahu lumende netekwatisa (igcis) kanye nedigify africa basandza kubamba umhlangano weinthanethi nenhlangano yetekulawulwa kwetetindzaba imedia monitoring africa (imma) kanye nebhodi yetemafilimu neyetekushicilela (ifpb) kute kufundziswe bantfwana, bothishela, batali kanye nemmango mayelana nendle la lekahle yekusebentisa iinthanethi.

src_text: phakamile khumalo, the programme manager of public and media skills development at mma, said seven out of 10 children who answered questions as part of the sa kids online study said they used the internet without their parents’ permission.
tgt_text: phakamile khumalo, longumphatsi weluhlelo lwetekutfutfukisa emakhono kuhulumende nakubenti ndzaba emma, watsi basikhombisa ebantfwaneni labalishumi labaphendvula imibuto njengendlela yelu chwaningo lwesa kids online study batsi basebe ntisa iinthanethi ngaphandle kwemvumo yebatali babo.

src_text: only four out of 10 children said they have some sort of information about online safety.
tgt_text: ngulabane kuphela kulabali shumi labanelwatiso lolutsite mayelana nekuphepha kuinthanethi.

src_text: this shows that children need skills and resources to help them use the internet safely.
tgt_text: loku kukhombisa kutsi bantfwana badzinga emakhono netinsita tekubasita kutsi basebentise iinthanethi ngendlela lephephile.

src_text: mmaletjema poto, the fpb’s child protection officer, said parents need to be aware of the dangers their children face online, in cluding viewing child pornography or child sexual abuse, and being groomed by sexual predators.
tgt_text: mmaletjema poto, lophe tse tekuvikela bantfwana kufpb, watsi batali kufuneka bati ngebungoti bantfwana babo labahlangabetana nabo kuinthanethi, lokufaka ekhatsi kubuka titfombe tekulalana tebantfwana noma kuhlukumeta bantfwana ngekwelicansi, netekubafundzisa ngetemacansi.

src_text: children can become the target of online sexual predators by just conducting an innocent internet search and clicking on the wrong link.
tgt_text: bantfwana bangaba bantfu labavuleleka malula kutsi bahlukunyetwe bahlukubeti betemacansi labakuinthanethi ngekusesha kuphela iinthanethi nangekucafata ilinki lengakafaneli.

src_text: offenders then gain their trust and start grooming them.
tgt_text: bantfwana babese bacala kutitsemba letigilamkhuba bese tiyacala kubafundzisa temacansi.

src_text: "the child is often embarrassed and therefore doesn’t speak about it, which makes it hard for them to get out of the grooming cycle," said poto.
tgt_text: "umntfwana uvamise kuba nemahloni bese akasakhu lumi ngaloko, lokwenta kube likhuni kutsi baphume kulomjikeleto wekufundziswa temacansi," kwasho poto.

src_text: she also warned against sharing videos or images of child pornography online.
tgt_text: wabese futsi lomake uchwayisa ngekutsi kungabelwana emavidiyo noma titfombe tetemacansi kuinthanethi.

src_text: "it has become a norm to share content on social media.
tgt_text: "sekungumkhuba kwabelana ngetintfo letsite kuinthanethi.

src_text: but sharing this type of content is evidence of child abuse.
tgt_text: kodvwa kwabelana ngetintfo letinjena kubufakazi bekuhlukunyetwa kwebantfwana.

src_text: being in possession of such content or sharing it is a criminal offence," added poto.
tgt_text: kutfolakala unetintfo noma kwabelana ngato kulicala," kwengeta poto.

src_text: help at hand there are various resources available to help children use the internet safely.

src_text: flood relief for kzn and e cape allison cooper government will help residents of kwazulunatal and the eastern cape rebuild their lives and homes after floods recently left a trail of death and destruction in the two provinces.
tgt_text: kuhhamuleka etikhukhuleni kwazulunatal nasemphumalanga kapa allison cooper hulumende utawusita bahlali bakwazulunatal nasemphumalanga kapa kutsi bakhe futsi kabusha timphilo tabo nemakhaya abo ngemuva kwekutsi tikhukhula letisandza kubakhona tishiye bantfu bafile futsi tente umonakalo kuletifundza letimbili.

src_text: president cyril ramaphosa said national treasury will make money available for relief efforts to help those affected by the floods.
tgt_text: mengameli cyril ramaphosa utsite temafa avelonkhe batakwenta kutsi kube khona imali yemitamo yekuhhamula kusita labo labakhahlametwe nguletikhukhula.

src_text: "the minister of finance has said that r1 billion is immediately available," he said.
tgt_text: "indvuna yetetimali itsite sigidzigidzi lesir1 siyatfolakala ngekushesha," kwasho yena.

src_text: president ramaphosa will also approach parliament for additional resources.
tgt_text: mengameli ramaphosa utawuphindza futsi atsintse iphalamende kutsi kutfolakale imitfombolusito leyengetiwe.

src_text: government is working with the solidarity fund, private sector and nongovernmental and communitybased organisations to support victims.
tgt_text: hulumende usebentisana nesikhwama selubumbano, umkhakha wangasese kanye netinhlangano letingasito tahulumende, netinhlangano temmango kusekela labo labakhahlametekile.

src_text: the solidarity fund will set up a separate bank account for the flood disaster for south african and foreign donors to contribute to relief efforts.
tgt_text: sikhwama selubumbano sitavula iakhawunti yasebhange leseceleni yenhlekelele yetikhukhula yebantfu baseningizimu afrika nebantfu bangephandle labanikela ngetimali kutsi bafake ligalelo kulemitamo yelusito lwekuhhamula.

src_text: government will also provide vouchers to help households rebuild partially damaged houses, the president said.
tgt_text: "hulumende utawuphindza futsi akhiphe emavawusha kusita emakhaya kutsi akhe futsi tindlu takho letidzilike kancane," kwasho mengameli.

src_text: "a comprehensive assessment of the economic cost of these floods still has to be made, but it is clear that it will run into billions of rands for the rebuilding of infrastructure and loss of production."
tgt_text: "luhlolo loluphelele lwetindleko tetemnotfo taletikhukhula lusatawukwentiwa, kodvwa kuyacaca kutsi titawubatigidzigidzi temarandi kute kwakhiwe kabusha sakhiwonchanti kanye nekulahleka kwemisebenti yekukhicita."

src_text: he added that the money set aside for the flood victims must reach those who need it the most.
tgt_text: wengete ngekutsi lemali lebe kelwe eceleni kufanele kutsi ifinyelele kulabo labakhahlabetwe tikhukhula labayidzinga kakhulu.

src_text: "it will be critical, as we undertake this work, that all the re sources we mobilise are used for their intended purposes and reach the intended recipients.
tgt_text: "kutawuba mcoka kakhulu kutsi, njengaloku senta lomsebenti, yonkhe lemitfombolusito lesiyihlanganisako isetjentiselwa tinhloso leticondzene nayo futsi ifinye lele kulabo lekumele kutsi bayitfole.

src_text: there can be no room for corruption, mismanagement or fraud of any sort," the president stressed.
tgt_text: ngeke kuvunyelwe inkhohlakalo, kungalawulwa kahle nome kukhwabanisa kwanome ngabe kwaluphi luhlobo," kwagcizelela yena njalo mengameli.

src_text: threephased response president ramaphosa said government will respond to the disaster in three phases.
tgt_text: lusito lolutigabatintsatfu mengameli ramaphosa utsite hulumende utawunikela ngelusito kulenhlekelele ngetigaba letintsatfu.

src_text: it will first focus on immediate humanitarian relief, ensuring that everyone affected is safe and their basic needs are met.
tgt_text: sekucala sitawugcila elusitweni lwebuntfu lwekuhhamula masinyane, kucinisekisa kutsi wonkhe umuntfu lotsintsekile uphephile kanye nekutsi tidzingo tabo letisisekelo kuyahlangabetanwa nato.

src_text: "second, we will focus on stabilisation and recovery, rehousing people who have lost homes and restoring the provision of services.
tgt_text: "kwesibili, sitawugcila ekusimamiseni nasekubuyiseni futsi, kunika bantfu tindlu labo labalahlekelwe ngemakhaya abo kanye nekubuyisa futsi nekwetfulwa kwetinsita.

src_text: "third, we will focus on reconstruction and rebuilding," he said.
tgt_text: kwesitsatfu, sitawugcila ekwakheni futsi kanye nasekubuyiseleni esimeni," kwasho yena njalo.

src_text: the reconstruction and building phase will include the construction of houses in suitable areas.
tgt_text: sigaba sekwakha futsi kanye nekubuyisela esimeni sitawufaka ekhatsi kwakhiwa kwetindlu etindzaweni letifanele.

src_text: the department of human settlements has already begun an assessment of damages to houses across the province.
tgt_text: litiko letekuhlaliswa kwebantfu selivele licalile ngekuhlola umonakalo wetindlu kuso sonkhe lesifundza.

src_text: "an immediate task is to house those people who have been displaced by the floods and preparations are underway to provide temporary residential units," said president ramaphosa.
tgt_text: "umsebesnti lekumele kutsi wentiwe masinyane, wekufaka labo bantfu labakhishwe tikhukhula etindlini kantsi sisenta emalungiselelo ekubanika tisetjentiswa tekuhlala tesikhashana," kwasho mengameli ramaphosa.

src_text: the department of public works and infrastructure is identifying suitable state land that can be used for resettlement.
tgt_text: litiko letemisebenti yahu lumende nesakhiwonchanti libuka umhlaba lofanele wembuso longasetjentiselwa kutsi kuhlaliswe futsi bantfu kuwo.

src_text: extensive damage the rains caused extensive damage to houses; businesses; roads and bridges; water, electricity, rail and telecommunications infrastructure.
tgt_text: umonakalo lomkhulu letimvula tibange umonakalo lomkhulu etindlini; kutemabhizinisi; emigwacweni nasemabhulohweni; emantini, kugezi, kutakhiwonchanti tekuhamba kwetitimela netekuchumana.

src_text: schools, health facilities, police stations and magistrates’ courts were also affected, along with fuel and food supplies.
tgt_text: tikolo, tikhungo tetemphilo, titeshi temaphoyisa netinkantolo tabomantji nato titsintsekile, kanye nekuphakelwa kwemafutsa ekuhambisa tigitjelwa nekudla.

src_text: "it is estimated that over 270 000 learners were affected and over 600 schools were damaged, 16 of which cannot be accessed due to damage to connecting roads and bridges.
tgt_text: "kulinganiselwa kubafundzi labangetulu kwe270 000 labatsintsekile etikolweni letingetulu kwe600 letonakalisekile, leti16 tato akufinyeleleki kuto ngenca yemonakalo yemigwaco yekuchumana nato kanye nemabhuloho.

src_text: "sixtysix public healthcare facilities were affected, although there has been minimal disruption to health services in most affected districts," the president said.
tgt_text: "tikhungo tahulumende tekunakekela ngemphilo letinge66 titsintsekile, nanome kube nekutsikameteka lokuncane kutinsito tetemphilo etigodzini letinyenti letitsintsekile," kwasho yena njalo mengameli.

src_text: extensive work is under way to restore basic services to various areas in kzn.

src_text: more than 400 people have lost their lives in kzn and many people are missing.
tgt_text: bantfu labangetulu kwe400 balahlekelwe timphilo tabo kwazulunatal kantsi labanyenti bantfu banyamalele.

src_text: the president said that the south african police service (saps) and the south african national defence force (sandf) have been leading search and rescue efforts.
tgt_text: mengameli utsite luphiko lwetemaphoyisa aseningizimu afrika (isaps) kanye nembutfo waseningizimu afrika wetekuvikela (isandf) bebahola imitamo yekutfungatsa nekuhlenga.

src_text: this includes the deployment of saps personnel, diving teams, canine units and various vessels, helicopters and fixedwing planes to the most affected areas.
tgt_text: loku kufaka ekhatsi kutfunyelwa kwetisebenti tesaps, licembu letekuntjwiza emantini, tinja tekutfungatsa, tindiza letineluphiko emhlane kanye netindiza etindzaweni letitsintseke kakhulu.

src_text: "aircraft from the sandf have been used both for rescue and for the delivery of relief supplies – such as food, water, tents and blankets – to people in inaccessible areas.
tgt_text: "tindiza tesandf tisetje ntiselwe kuhlenga nekuletsa tinsita tekuhhamula – njengekudla, manti, emathende netingubo – kubantfu labasetindzaweni lokungafi nyeleleki kuto.

src_text: "i have authorised the sandf to bring in more personnel, water storage and purification supplies and engineering teams to assist with electricity and water restoration," he said government departments at national and provincial levels; municipalities; nongovernmental organisations and businesses have been distributing basic relief materials such as food, blankets, mattresses, clothing, chronic medication, toiletries and cooking utensils.
tgt_text: "sengigunyate isandf kutsi iletse tisebenti letinyenti, tilondvoloti temanti kanye netisetjentiswa tekuwahlanta kanye nemacembu etebunjiniyela atewusita ngagezi kanye nekubuyiswa kwemanti," kwasho yena.

src_text: operation vulindlela is opening the path to growth vukuzenzele unnamed the south african economy, like any other economy, cannot function, let alone grow, without efficient and competitive network industries.
tgt_text: ioperation vulindlela ivula indlela yekukhulisa umnotfo vukuzenzele unnamed umnotfo waseningizimu afrika, njengawo wonkhe umnotfo, angeke usebente, futsi angeke ukhule, ngaphandle kwekusebenta nekucudzelana kahle kweluchungechunge lwetimboni.

src_text: these industries – which include electricity, water, transport and telecommunications – are the arteries through which the oxygen of the economy runs.
tgt_text: letimboni leti – letifaka ekhatsi gezi, emanti, tigitjelwa netekuchumana ngetincingo – tingumtsambo wekuphila kwetemnotfo.

src_text: structural problems in these areas have long been cited as some of the main constraints on south africa’s economic growth.
tgt_text: tinkinga letimayela nekuhleleka kulomkhakha tabonwa kudzala taba nguletinye tihibe letihamba embili ekukhuleni kwemnotfo waseningizimu afrika.

src_text: inefficiency and the high cost of network services are an impediment to doing business in the country.
tgt_text: kungasebenti kahle kanye netindleko letisetulu tenethiwekhi kuvimbela kwenta ibhizinisi kulelive.

src_text: to address and overcome these challenges, we set up operation vulindlela in october 2020 as an initiative of the presidency and national treasury to accelerate structural reforms in these network industries.
tgt_text: kubukana nekusombulula letinseyeya, sisungule ioperation vulindlela ngemphala 2020 njengalenye indlela yelihhovisi lamengameli nelemgcinimafa wave lonkhe yekunika emandla tingucuko tekuhleleka kuloluchungechunge lwetimboni.

src_text: while the responsible government departments and entities drive these reforms, operation vulindlela monitors and identifies challenges and blockages.
tgt_text: ngalesikhatsi ematiko netikhungo tahulumende tenta letingucuko, ioperation vulindlela yona itawugadza futsi ibuke tinseyeya netihibe.

src_text: where needed, it facilitates technical support to departments.
tgt_text: lapho kudzingeka khona, itawuniketa kusekela lokufanele kulamatiko.

src_text: the recent quarterly report outlines the progress made by operation vulindlela and the departments responsible for these reforms.
tgt_text: lombiko wekota losandza kuphuma uchaza kahle umsebenti losewentiwe yioperation vulindlela kanye nematiko lanemsebenti wekwenta letingucuko.

src_text: across government, our focus is on reforms that are fundamental and transformative; that reshape the way our economy works.
tgt_text: kuwo wonkhe hulumende, sigcile kakhulu kutingucuko letisisekelo naletiletsa luntjintjo; letitawenta kabusha indlela lensha yekusebenta kwemnotfo wetfu.

src_text: this includes the auction of highdemand spectrum for mobile telecommunications, which was delayed for more than 10 years and finally completed in march.
tgt_text: loku kufaka kufakwa endalini kwebuchakachaka betekuchumana ngemagagasi emoya, lokubanjelelwe iminyaka lengetulu kwalelishumi lokugcine kucedzelwa ngendlovulenkhulu.

src_text: the release of new spectrum will improve connectivity and bring down broadband costs.
tgt_text: lokukhululwa kwalobuchakachaka lobusha kutawutfutfukisa kuchumana futsi kwehlise tindleko tedatha.

src_text: the establishment of the national ports authority as a separate subsidiary of transnet last year had been delayed for more than 15 years.
tgt_text: kusungulwa kweluphiko lwetemachweba avelonkhe abe incenye lengaphansi kwetransnet lomnyaka lowengcile kwabambeleleka ngeminyaka lengetulu kwelishumi nesihlanu.

src_text: this was the necessary first step towards enabling private sector participation and increasing the efficiency of our port terminals.
tgt_text: loku bekusinyatselo sekucala lesimcoka lesenta kutsi kungene umkhakha lotimele nesekukhulisa kusebenta kahle kwematheminali emachweba.

src_text: we have also reinstated the blue drop, green drop and no drop system for the first time since 2014 to ensure better monitoring of water and wastewater treatment quality.
tgt_text: siphindze futsi sabuyisa luhlelo lweblue drop, lwegreen drop nelweno drop kwekucala kusuka ngemnyaka we2014 kucinisekisa kutsi silandzelela kahle kusetjentiswa nekusebenta kwemanti lasezingeni.

src_text: we have published an updated critical skills list, also for the first time since 2014. these are just some examples where, by focusing effort and attention on a limited number of priority reforms, this administration has been able to drive progress.
tgt_text: sishicilele saphindza sabuyeketa luhlu lwemakhono labucayi, nawo kwekucala kusukela ngemnyaka we2014.

src_text: through operation vulindlela, we have also been able to take a more focused and holistic approach to reforms, ensuring better coordination where multiple departments and entities are involved.
tgt_text: loku kunguletinye tibonelo letikhomba kutsi, ngekufaka emandla kumitamo nasekubukisiseni tingucuko letimbalwa leticaliswa embili, lohulumende lona ukhonile kuta nenchubekela embili.

src_text: the best example of this is in the energy sector, where a number of important, interconnected reforms are underway to change the way that we generate and consume electricity.
tgt_text: ngekusebentisa ioperation vulindlela , sikhonile kulandzela indlela lenembako kakhulu nalefaka konkhe kuletingucuko, lecinisekisa kuchumana lokuncono lapho khona kungenelele ematiko lahlukahlukene netikhungo.

src_text: milestones include the raising of the licensing threshold for new generation projects to 100mw, allowing these projects to connect to the grid and sell power to customers.
tgt_text: sibonelo lesihamba embili saloku sikulomkhakha wetemandla, lapho kube khona tingucuko letinengi letimcoka, letinekuchumana letitawentiwa kute sintjintje indlela lesiphehla ngayo gezi nalesiwusebentisa ngayo.

src_text: we have revived the renewable energy independent power producer procurement programme through the opening of new bid windows.
tgt_text: lokucophe umlandvo kufaka ekhatsi kukhushulwa kwemkhawulo wemalayisensi emiklamo lemisha yekuphehla gezi iye ku100mw, kuvumela lemiklamo kutsi ichume kumzila lomkhulu nekutsi itsengisele bantfu gezi.

src_text: changes to the regulations on new generation capacity have allowed municipalities to procure power independently for the first time.
tgt_text: sibuyekete luhlelo lwekutsenga gezi kubakhiciti labatimele ngekuvula sikhatsi lesisha sekufaka ticelo.

src_text: and legislative reforms will ultimately give birth to a new competitive electricity market, supported by the publication of the electricity regulation amendment bill and the work underway to amend the electricity pricing policy.
tgt_text: tingucuko kumitsetfo mgomo mayelana nekukhicita kabusha emandla tivumele bomasipala kutsi batitsengele gezi kwekucala ngca.

src_text: the process of unbundling eskom is on track, with the entity meeting its december 2021 deadline for the establishment of a national transmission company.
tgt_text: futsi tingucuko temtsetfo titawubanga kutsi kube nekuchudzelana lokusha kumakethe yegezi, letawusekelwa kushicilelwa kwemtsetfosivivinywa wekuchibiyela tinchubo mtsetfo tegezi futsi umsebenti wekuchibiyela inchubomgomo yetindleko tagezi usentiwa.

src_text: by december this year we hope to complete the unbundling of eskom’s generation and distribution divisions.
tgt_text: luhlelo lwekuhlukanisa tigaba teeskom lusendleleni, lapho khona lesikhungo sihambisana nesikhatsi lesibekiwe lesiyingongoni 2021 sekutsi kusungulwe inkampani yavelonkhe yekukhicita gezi.

src_text: the quarterly report highlights a number of other important achievements, as well as areas where intensive work is underway.
tgt_text: ngengongoni kulomnyaka sinelitsemba lekutsi sitawucedzela kuhlukanisa letigaba teeskom tekukhicita nekusabalalisa gezi.

src_text: in the water sector, operation vulindlela has been providing technical support to the department of water and sanitation to implement a turnaround plan for the granting of water use licences, with a target to process 80% of all applications within 90 days.
tgt_text: umbiko wekota uchaza letinye tintfo letinengi letentiwe, kanye netindzawo lapho kusadzingeka kusentiwe khona umsebenti lomkhulu.

src_text: work is also underway to establish a national water resources infrastructure agency that will ensure better management of our national water resources.
tgt_text: kulomkhakha wemanti, ioperation vulindlela beyiniketa kusekela lokubucayi kulitiko letemanti nekutfutfwa kwendle kute kube neluhlelo lwekugucula simo kulokuniketwa kwemalayisensi ekusebentisa emanti, ngenhloso yekuphotfula ticelo leti80% etinsukwini leti90.

src_text: in the transport sector, inefficiencies in port and rail have severely affected our ability to export goods.
tgt_text: umsebenti wekusungula iejensi yavelonkhe yesa khiwonchanti semitfombo yemanti usetawenti wa letawucinisekisa kulawulwa kahle kwemitfombo yavelonkhe yemanti.

src_text: work is underway to establish partnerships with private sector operators to invest in port infrastructure and improve the management of container terminals at the ports of durban and ngqura.
tgt_text: kumkhakha wetigitjelwa, kungasebenti kahle kwemachweba nemizila yetfu yetitimela kube nemtselela lomkhulu kulamandla etfu ekuhambisa imphahla emaveni angaphandle.

src_text: the white paper on national rail policy, which was approved by cabinet in march, outlines plans to revitalise rail infrastructure and enables third party access to the freight rail network.
tgt_text: umsebenti wekucala wekusebentisana nemkhakha lotimele usetawentiwa kute kutjalwe timali kusakhiwonchanti semachweba nekutfutfukisa kuphatfwa kwematheminali eticukatsi kumachweba asethekwini nasengqura.

src_text: transnet freight rail is already in the process of making slots available for private rail operators on the network.
tgt_text: umbiko wahulumende lomayelana nenchubomgomo yavelonkhe yetemizila yetitimela, lowavunywa yikhabhinethi ngendlovulenkhulu, ubuka kahle tindlela tekuvuselela sakhiwonchanti semzila wetitimela nekuvumela labanye balingani labatimele kutsi basebentise imizila yetitimela tetra nsnet.

src_text: a fully operational evisa system has been launched in 14 countries, including some of our largest tourist markets.
tgt_text: luhlelo lolusebenta ngalokuphelele lweevisa lusunguliwe emaveni la14, lafaka ekhatsi lamanye emave latimakethe letinkhulu tetfu tekuvakasha.

src_text: a comprehensive review of the work visa system is also underway to enable us to attract the skills that our economy needs.
tgt_text: kubuyeketa lokukhulu kweluhlelo lwekusebentisa ivisa nalo lusalungiswa kute sikhone kuheha emakhono ladzingwa live lakitsi.

src_text: these reforms have been made possible due to better collaboration across government behind a shared reform agenda.
tgt_text: letingucuko tibangwe kutsi kube nekusebentisana nematiko lahlukene ahulumende lasebentisa luhlelo lwekusebentisana kuletsa tingucuko.

src_text: we call on business and investors to take advantage of the changes that are underway and turn their pledges and commitments into tangible, job creating investments.
tgt_text: ioperation vulindlela ivula indlela yekukhulisa umnotfo vukuzenzele unnamed umnotfo waseningizimu afrika, njengawo wonkhe umnotfo, angeke usebente, futsi angeke ukhule, ngaphandle kwekusebenta nekucudzelana kahle kweluchungechunge lwetimboni.

src_text: south africa’s first veterinary nurses graduate allison cooper being one of the country’s first veterinary nurse graduates is a dream come true for randburg resident phumelela mthimkhulu (21), who has been passionate about animals since she was a child.
tgt_text: bahlengikati bekucala betilwane batfola ticu tabo allison cooper kuba ngulomunye webahlengikati bekucala betilwane kutsi batfole ticu kukuphumelela kweliphupho lesakhamuti saserandburg phumelela mthimkhulu (21), lobekanelutsandvo lwetilwane kusukela asesengumntfwana.

src_text: mthimkhulu recently graduated from the university of pretoria (up), the only veterinary training facility in sa, with a bachelor of veterinary nursing degree.
tgt_text: mthimkhulu usandza kutfola ticu takhe eyunivesithi yasepretoria (iup), lekungiso sodvwa sikhungo sekufundzela kuhlenga tilwane eningizimu afrika, utfole ticu tebachelor of vete rinary nursing.

src_text: "it’s crazy to wrap my head around.
tgt_text: "angikhoni kukuvisisa loku lokwentekile.

src_text: to know that i was part of the first class to do the bachelor’s degree, which has been years in the making, is an honour.
tgt_text: kwati kutsi bengiyincenye yeliklasi lekucala lekwenta tifundvo tedegree, lokutsetse iminyaka kutsi kwenteke, kuyintfo lenhle kakhulu.

src_text: "i’m grateful for the opportunities and doors that will open for us nurses to further our studies and specialise within our profession, which was hard to do in the past," she says.
tgt_text: "ngiyawabonga lamatfuba naleminyango letasivulekela sibahlengikati ekutsi sikhone kuchubeka netifundvo tetfu bese siba bochwepheshe labakhetsekile kulomkhakha wetfu, lebekuyintfo lenzima kuyenta esikhatsini lesengcile," usho njalo.

src_text: tamarin fisher, the pre sident of the veterinary nurses association of south africa, says this is the biggest milestone in the profession’s 42year history.
tgt_text: tamarin fisher, longu mengameli wenhlangano yebahlengikati betilwane eningizimu afrika, utsi loku kuyincophamlandvo kulomsebenti loseneminyaka le42.

src_text: "the new threeyear degree will give qualified nurses the opportunity to enrol in postgraduate studies, which will hopefully culminate in the awarding of masters and phd degrees."
tgt_text: "ticu letinsha teminyaka lemitsatfu titawuniketa bahlengikati labaceceshiwe litfuba lekutsi babhalisele kwenta tifundvo tabo tepostgraduate, lokutawenta kutsi batfole ticu tehonours, temasters netephd.

src_text: veterinarians treat animals’ injuries and illnesses, similar to how a doctor provides health treatment for people.
tgt_text: "bodokotela betilwane bayatilapha uma tilimele noma tigula, ngendlela lefanako neyabodokotela uma balapha bantfu.

src_text: veterinary nurses are essential in vets’ professional teams, says mthimkhulu.
tgt_text: bahlengikati betilwane bamcoka kakhulu emacenjini ebuchwephesha abodokotela betilwane, kusho mthimkhulu.

src_text: "some of the vital skills a nurse has to display are patient care, client communication, assisting veterinarians with procedures, and anything that will help the veterinary hospital to function at its best.
tgt_text: "lamanye emakhono lamcoka lekufuneka umhlengikati abe nawo kunakekela sigulane, kukhu luma nemaklayenti, kusita bodokotela betilwane ngetindlela tekulapha, nanganoma ngani letawusita sibhedlela setilwane kutsi sente umsebenti waso ngemphumelelo.

src_text: "it’s one of the most rewarding professions.
tgt_text: "kungulomunye wemisebenti lokhokhelako.

src_text: if you want to be a veterinary nurse, don’t allow fear or a lack of knowledge to deter you from trying it out and enjoying it because it will change your life for the better," says mthimkhulu.
tgt_text: uma ufuna kuba ngumhle ngikati wetilwane, ungavumeli kwesaba noma kuswela lwati kukuvimbele kutsi ungakulingi nekutsi ukutfokotele ngoba kutawugucula imphilo yakho ibe ngulencono," kusho mthimkhulu.

src_text: bursaries to address skills shortagedue to a severe skills shortage in the sector, mthimkhulu didn’t battle to find a job.
tgt_text: imifundzate letawu bukana nekuswelakala kwemakhonongenca yekuswelakala kakhulu kwemakhono kulomkhakha, mthimkhulu akazange ahlupheke kutfola umsebenti.

src_text: "i was lucky enough to secure a job at fourways veterinary hospital during my final year.
tgt_text: "ngaba nenhlanhla kutfola umsebenti efourways veterinary hospital nga lesikhatsi ngenta umnyaka wekufundza wekugcina.

src_text: i started working there about a month after my final exams and i’ve been enjoying every moment of it," she says.
tgt_text: ngacala kusebenta lapho emva kwenyanga ngicedze kubhala luhlolo lwami lwekugcina futsi ngisaloku ngisitfokotela sonkhe sikhatsi salomsebenti," usho njalo.

src_text: the health and welfare sector education and training authority (hwseta) is committed to addressing the extreme skills shortage in the veterinary sector and ensuring transformation.
tgt_text: luphiko ihealth and welfare sector education and trai ning authority (ihwseta) lutibophelele kubukana nalokuswelakala ka khulu kwemakhono kulo mkhakha wete kulashwa kwetilwane nasekucinisekiseni kutsi kuba netingucuko.

src_text: it recently launched a veterinary science career guidance campaign, in partnership with the department of higher education and training, and will be visiting rural schools to encourage learners to consider veterinary services as a career path.
tgt_text: muva nje loluphiko lusandza kucala umkhankhaso lowatisa ngetemisebenti yetesayensi kutekulashwa kwetilwane, ngekusebentisana nelitiko letemfundvo lephakeme netekuce cesha, futsi batawuvakashela tikolo tasemakhaya kute bagcugcutele ba fundzi kutsi bente tifundvo temisebenti yekulashwa kwetilwane kute kube yindlela yabo yemsebenti.

src_text: it also announced 60 bursaries to address the critical shortage of veterinarians and paraveterinarians in south africa’s rural areas.
tgt_text: luphindze futsi lwamemetela kutsi kunemifundzate le60 letawubukana nalokuswelakala lokubucayi kwabodokotela nekwebasebenti betekulashwa kwetilwane etindzaweni tasemakhaya eningizimu afrika.

src_text: "the bursaries are specifically aimed at learners in rural areas as they can take their knowledge back to their homesteads," says dr nomfundo mnisi, the chairperson of the hwseta.
tgt_text: "lemifundzate icondziswe kakhulu kuphela kubafundzi labasetindzaweni tasemakhaya njengoba kulindzeleke kutsi bahambe nalolwati babuyele nalo etindzaweni tabo lapho babuya khona," kusho dkt nomfundo mnisi, sihlalo wehwseta.

src_text: the deputy minister of higher education, science and innovation, buti manamela, welcomed the bursaries.
tgt_text: lisekela lendvuna yetemfundvo lephakeme, tesayensi netekuticambela, buti manamela, wayamukela lemifundzate.

src_text: the up’s faculty of vete rinary science will assist the hwseta in its marketing, bursary funding and recruitment campaigns.
tgt_text: sigaba setemfundvo setesayensi kutekulashwa kwetilwane saseup sitawusita ihwseta nge mikhankhaso yekwatisa, yesikhwama semifundzate neyekuheha bafundzi.

src_text: "we will also assist the hwseta in administering the bursaries, which were allocated for firstyear veterinary science stu dents from the designated groups," says chris van blerk, the head of communications and media at up’s faculty of veterinary science.
tgt_text: "sitawuphindza futsi sisite ihwseta ekulawuleni lemifundzate, letawuniketwa bafundzi bemnyaka wekucala kutekulashwa kwetilwane labavela kulamacembu labekiwe," kusho chris blerk, inhloko yete kuchumana netetindzaba kumkhakha wetesayensi yetekulashwa kwetilwane eup.

src_text: he says youth hoping to follow in mthimkhulu’s footsteps and register for a first bachelor’s degree at up need to have completed their national senior certificate (nsc), or equivalent qualification, and meet minimum requirements.
tgt_text: utsi lusha lolufuna kuhamba etinyatselweni tamthimkhulu nekubhalisela ticu tekucala eup kufuneka lube luphotfule matikuletjeni (insc), noma imiphumela lelingana naloko, futsi babe bahambisana nesidzingo lesimkhawulo lomncane lobekiwe.

src_text: "for the bachelor of veterinary nursing degree, they need a minimum admission point score of 28 and an nsc with english home language or english first additional language, mathematics, and physical sciences or life sciences," he adds.
tgt_text: "kuticu tebachelor of vete rinary nursing, kudzingeka ube nemaphuzu ekwamukelwa la28 kanye nensc lenesingisi njengelulwimi lwasekhaya noma sibe lulwimi lwekucala lolwengetiwe, tibalo, kanye nephysical science nome nelife sciences," wengeta ngaloko.

src_text: for more information about the sector, youth can contact private vete rinary practices or speak to compulsory community service (ccs) veterinarians which are part of the department of agriculture, land reform and rural development (dalrrd) around the country.
tgt_text: kutfola lwati lolubanti ngalomkhakha, lusha lungatsintsa bodokotela betilwane labatimele noma bakhulume nabodokotela betilwane bemimmango (iccs) labayincenye yelitiko letekulima, tingucuko kutemhlaba nekutfutfukiswa kwetindzawo tasemakhaya (idalrrd) labakulo lonkhe live letfu.

src_text: "the ccs programme aims to provide accessible and affordable veterinary services to underserved and poor resourced areas within south africa.
tgt_text: "luhlelo lweccs luhlose kwenta kutsi kube nekufinyelela nekutfolakala kwetinsita tekulashwa kwetilwane letingabiti kakhulu etindzaweni letinge natinsita letanele eningizimu afrika.

src_text: as such, vets in the programme will always serve as good information resources," says van blerk.
tgt_text: bahlengikati bekucala betilwane batfola ticu tabo allison cooper kuba ngulomunye webahlengikati bekucala betilwane kutsi batfole ticu kukuphumelela kweliphupho lesakhamuti saserandburg phumelela mthimkhulu (21), lobekanelutsandvo lwetilwane kusukela asesengumntfwana.

src_text: collect your driver's licence card vukuzenzele unnamed motorists who applied for a new or renewal driver’s licence card or professional driving permit (prdp) between october and december last year are being urged to collect them.
tgt_text: landza likhadi lakho lelayisensi yekushayela vukuzenzele unnamed bashayeli betimoto labafake ticelo telikhadi lelisha noma lekuvuselela ilayi sensi yekushayela noma imvume yekushayela ngekwemsebenti iprofessional driving permit (iprdp) emkhatsini kwemphala nengongoni lomnyaka lowengcile bayacelwa kutsi balandze emakhadi abo.

src_text: according to the road traffic management corporation (rtmc), only 42% of the 32 748 driver’s licence cards produced during this time have been collected.
tgt_text: ngekusho kwenhlangano lelawula titfutsi emgwa ceni (irmtc), kulandvwe kuphela emakhadi ekushayela la42% kulalangu32 748 lakhicitiwe ngalesikhatsi.

src_text: minister of transport fikile mbalula opened the rtmc licensing centres in midrand and eco park last year, in response to the backlog of expired driver’s licences due to covid19.
tgt_text: indvuna yetekutfutsa fikile mbalula uvule tikhungo temalayisensi termtc emidrand naseeco park lomnyaka lophelile, kute alwe kucedza lokusalela emuva kwemalayisensi lasaphelelwe sikhatsi ngenca yecovid19.

src_text: the driver’s licence card account, which prints the licences, is working around the clock to fasttrack production and remains on course to clear the backlog by the end of june.
